title: Collaborations — Data Science & Technology
text:
Collaborations & Partnerships
We collaborate with academic, industry, and public sector partners, including:

Local authorities and transport operators
Technology companies working on mobility and data platforms
Interdisciplinary research groups across the University of Leeds
International research collaborators

If your organisation is interested in collaborating, please get in touch.

title: Projects — Data Science & Technology
text:
Current Research Projects
A placeholder listing of active research projects within the theme.

Project A: Real-time traffic prediction (EPSRC-funded)
Project B: Automated public transport modelling (industry partnership)
Project C: Mobility equity and accessibility (ESRC collaboration)

Project pages will be expanded with abstracts, funding details, and contacts.

title: Data Science and Technology
text: Data Science and Technology (DST) is a theme within the Institute for Transport Studies (ITS) at the University of Leeds. The theme joins-up data-intensive research across ITS research groups, applying data science and machine learning techniques to transport and mobility challenges.

title: DST
text: This is a placeholder for a paper.

title: About — Data Science & Technology
text:
About the Data Science & Technology theme
The Data Science & Technology theme at the Institute for Transport Studies (ITS), University of Leeds brings together researchers working at the intersection of data science, machine learning, and transport systems.
Our mission is to develop methods and tools that improve transport planning, operations, and policy through better data, modelling, and technology.
Key focus areas include:

Mobility data science and analytics
Transport modelling and simulation
Machine learning for transport applications
Intelligent transport systems and automation
Spatial data science and networks

We collaborate across the University and with external partners to ensure our research has academic rigor and real-world impact.

title: Publications — Data Science & Technology
text:

This is a placeholder list of recent publications from the Data Science & Technology theme.

Author A, Author B (2025). Title of paper. Journal of Transport Data.

For the full list, we will provide a living publications page linked to a BibTeX file or external repository.

title: Research degrees — Data Science & Technology
text:
Research degrees
We have opportunities for prospective postgraduate researchers. Example projects and funding opportunities can be found in our PhD directory.
Previous topics have included:

Data-driven demand modelling
Machine learning for traffic forecasting
Spatial analysis of transport accessibility
Mobility behaviour modelling using large-scale datasets

For details on applying, funding, and supervisors, please see the ITS PhD pages or contact our postgraduate admissions team.
